BASIS
============================
```{r}
f <- function(x, y, z=1){
result <- x + (2*y) + (3*z)
return(result)
}

f(2,3,4)
f(2,3)
f(z=4, y=2, 3)
```

args() function to view the parameter names and default values:
```{r}
args(f)
```


RECURSIVE
=====================
#Factorial
```{r}
    recur_factorial <- function(n) {
    if(n <= 1) {
    return(1)
    } else {
    return(n * recur_factorial(n-1))
    }
    }

recur_factorial(5)
```

#Harmonic serie
```{r}
    harmonic <- function(n) {
    if(n <= 1) {
    return(1)
    } else {
    return(1/n + harmonic(n-1))
    }
    }


harmonic(3)*60000*0.25
```

#Sume
```{r}
    Sum.Series <- function(number)
    {
    if(number == 0) {
    return (0)
    } else {
    return ((number * number ) + Sum.Series(number - 1))
    }
    }
    Sum.Series(3)
```
